title: Awards
description: Local awards and recognition programs from the Greater Fox Cities Bowling Association.

sections.heading: Award Forms
sections.content:
Download our awards application forms:

- [Awards Form – Paper](https://www.greaterfoxcitiesba.com/wp-content/uploads/gfcba-awards-application.pdf)
- [Awards Form – Online](https://bit.ly/gfcusbc-awards)
- [Awards Control Form](https://www.greaterfoxcitiesba.com/wp-content/uploads/Awards-Control-Form.pdf)

sections.heading: Eligibility
sections.content:
**Who:** Adults, 18 years or older, who are sanctioned in any certified league within Greater Fox Cities USBC, are eligible for the awards shown below. Bowler must pay sanction, and card must be received by Association Manager, in order to be valid.

**When:** Use last season's Bowl.com average until bowler establishes new average this season, 21 games, then use this current season's average going forward. If no average is available, then awards will begin for that bowler after 21 games this season in that league. Previous season scores are not eligible for local awards.

**Where:** Forms are available on our website, and League Secretary packets. Bowlers should contact their secretary. Secretaries should turn forms into the Association Manager.
